message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $13,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $13,000 is too low. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I think $13,200 would be a fair price for us both.
